alert.note: Alert for Phillips (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 7:40PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Phillips County through 815 PM CDT... At 740 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Marvell, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marvell, Helena-West Helena, Lexa, Watkins Corner, Poplar Grove, Huma, Preston Place, Quarles, Oneida, Barton, Wycamp, Latour, Kindall, Turkey Scratch, Kingtown, Gobell, Spring Creek, Trenton, Cypert and Delta Heritage Trails State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for eastern Arkansas.
